content: In the spec, specifying _summary = text should return the text element and any mandatory fields. However, this doesn't seem to be happening - for example medicationOrder.medication is not included in the response...

That was fun implementing that in my server.
Had to be another mode for the serializer
Aw man, @David Hay you're right. Did that always work that way? I don't remember seeing mandatory elements being there when I implemented _summary=text. Quite possibly I just missed it though
